highlightGroups.name: MRO Facility
highlightGroups.highlight: A maintenance facility that performs routine inspections and major overhauls to ensure aircraft safety and efficiency.

highlightGroups.name: GYM
highlightGroups.highlight: A fitness center equipped for weight training, group classes, and sports activities.

highlightGroups.name: Clinic
highlightGroups.highlight: Provides accessible healthcare for students and staff, offering basic medical care, first aid, and health support on campus.

highlightGroups.name: Main Gate
highlightGroups.highlight: Primary gate for students and staff use.

properties.coverage: J. Calvo Bldg., A. Arnaiz Bldg. and extension, SHS Bldg.

highlightGroups.name: J. Calvo Building
highlightGroups.highlight: An avionics department with emergency slide training and main aircraft garage.

highlightGroups.name: A. Arnaiz Building
highlightGroups.highlight: This facility offers rooms for students and administrative staff, covering departments such as DSA, marketing, drawing, computing, and includes a science laboratory for various activities.

highlightGroups.name: SHS Building
highlightGroups.highlight: The Senior High School Building houses the Senior High School Department.

highlightGroups.name: ALSIM
highlightGroups.highlight: An advanced simulator for flight training, where student pilots practice maneuvers and emergency procedures.

highlightGroups.name: Accounting Office
highlightGroups.highlight: An office that handles financial matters, including tuition fees, and student accounts.

highlightGroups.name: Registrar's Office
highlightGroups.highlight: An office that manages student records, including enrollment, grades, and other academic information.

highlightGroups.name: Clubhouse
highlightGroups.highlight: A recreational facility where students can gather for Bible studies, relaxation, and social activities like mind games and free coffee. On Sundays, it transforms into a church for worship and community gatherings.

highlightGroups.name: Residence Hall 3
highlightGroups.highlight: The residence halls that provides accommodation for students and visitors.

highlightGroups.name: Residence Hall 4 and 2
highlightGroups.highlight: Provides accommodation for students and visitors with modern facilities.

highlightGroups.name: Main Academic Building
highlightGroups.highlight: The main building that houses the administration, classrooms, and the library.

highlightGroups.name: Cafeteria
highlightGroups.highlight: A dining facility that serves meals and snacks for students and staff.

highlightGroups.name: Terminal Building
highlightGroups.highlight: A building facilitating passenger processing with check-in, security, baggage, and boarding areas.

highlightGroups.name: Sabsaban Dining Area
highlightGroups.highlight: A self-service dining area where individuals can choose from a variety of pre-prepared meals, snacks, and beverages in a casual, social setting.

highlightGroups.name: Multipurpose Facility
highlightGroups.highlight: This hall serves as a flexible space for assemblies, sports events, performances, and meetings, accommodating both educational and recreational activities for students and staff.

highlightGroups.name: Main Parking Lot
highlightGroups.highlight: A designated area for vehicles to park, providing convenience and accessibility for students and staff.

highlightGroups.name: Main Vehicle Entrance
highlightGroups.highlight: Primary gate for vehicles and visitors, providing secure access to the campus.
